titles: De instrumentis plantariis cui usui inserviunt, & quomodo sunt tractanda / a Samuele Fostero ... = Of the planetary instruments : to what end they serve, and how they are to be used / by Samuel Foster ...
author: Foster, Samuel, d. 1652.
notes: Text in Latin and English in facing parallel columns.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
keywords: Scientific apparatus and instruments --  Early works to 1800.
